website_summaries.verdict: This powerful facial moisturizer is frequently recommended by professionals.
pros: You don't need to apply much to see and feel the effects
Has a pleasant, natural smell and doesn't leave skin feeling too greasy
Not only moisturizes, but also lifts the skin as well
cons: Users with extremely dry skin felt they needed something stronger

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing Genious
customer_reviews.text: Skip the word face lift and think the best moisturizer ever. You need very little. Give it time to dry and makeup goes on smoothly. Not to mention it tightens without the feel of tightening. One of the products that when you switch to something else, you really miss what you had.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hogan

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be dissatisfied! It’s worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product is completely worth the extra money for just a facial moisturizer, i have never had my skin feel as hydrated and lifted as I did with this. I use it am and pm on my face and neck and it is already making me glow and lifting so well! I am really impressed, happily too because i was skeptical about the price for such a small bottle, but the ingredients and the fact that it’s lightweight make up for anything wrong I definitely recommend this to anyone who wants days old younger softer skin!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn carter

customer_reviews.title: Best wrinkle repair on the market
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to have found on Amazon as I have only been able to find in luxury spas in the past. This line is definitely worth the expense. My dermatologist recommended to me about 6 years ago. Other creams (Especially drug store brands) just don’t cut it in fine lines and wrinkles compared to this product. I’ve used in the past and since purchasing I can see a visible difference. You don’t need near the amount to cover your face so it will last up to 3 months- save in using the subscription deal.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I never noticed a change after using this product for 5 months. It's too expensive. I went back to using Strivectin.
customer_reviews.author: Baywatch

customer_reviews.title: Not for very dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers that this product is good it you have oily or normal skin. I have very dry skin and this did nothing to add moisture to my skin. I do love the toner and balm which are very hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cibella

customer_reviews.title: Light, moisturizing and firming!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product at Eau Spa in Palm Beach FL. 5 years ago. It's amazing, all of the Hydropeptide products are! I can't count how many times I've ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L Schreiner

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with HydroPeptide's Face Lift. It's a medium weight moisturizer that leaves my skin feeling hydrated and appearing brighter. It has a super fresh scent that I'm loving and a moisturizer taht is great to use day and night.
customer_reviews.author: josie marina

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I never typically write reviews but I thought I should for this product. This is hands down the best anti aging product I have ever used. I wish I had taken a before picture. I had a very prominent line in the middle of my forehead and after a week of using this product, it is gone. My face feels tightened and my skin tone has an even consistency. This is now my go to product. Love it. It’s worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Tweedell

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works well ... could see and feel a difference within a week
customer_reviews.author: Chas L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a non-greasy facial application that appears to live up to its claims of renewing an aging face.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Even my husband noticed my face is ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Even my husband noticed my face is fuller and has less wrinkles...I didn't even have to prod him into an answer!
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for about 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: cecelia vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible moisture
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff. Absorbs quickly, smells natural (kind of like grapefruit), and leaves skin happy but not oily. Pair it with the power serum and eye cream.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I really like the moisturizing effects and the smell is nice and ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the moisturizing effects and the smell is nice and fresh, but not sure if it actually tightens my skin. I don't use it daily maybe that's why, but I thought I should see visible tightening when I put it on. Overall I love this brand and their eye cream does help with puffiness under the eye within 30 minutes that I put it on but again not as much as I would like for the price. The name says "face lift" so I expected more out of this product especially for the price I paid. It did a great job moisturizing, but I would never pay $78 for just a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Face Lift. Have been using over a year and it works!!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: I like to use it on my neck
customer_reviews.text: Helps plump up skin as it has Hyaluronic acid. I like to use it on my neck. I use all over my face once a day in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Wicklund

customer_reviews.title: Hydropeptide eye cream
customer_reviews.text: great introduced to this brand recently. Really enjoying this eye cream
customer_reviews.author: StacyA

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! Oil of Olay for years and now its ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Oil of Olay for years and now its time to upgrade.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Moisturizer I will buy again and again!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this moisturizer. Feels and smells good, is light and absorbs easy, plus I think it makes my skin look younger, minimizes lines.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Millington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had not tried this before and like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lotion overall, light but effective for oily to normal skin. Dry skin would require something heavier.
customer_reviews.author: C Kommerstad-Reiche

customer_reviews.title: These are great products, and I like the 4 oz moisturiser
customer_reviews.text: Why are some of the products no longer available? These are great products, and I like the 4 oz moisturiser, but didn't pay $125 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: I recently had a facial at a Spa and the esthetician recommended this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Although the product description states this is very moisturizing, I did not find it to be so. I recently had a facial at a Spa and the esthetician recommended this moisturizer. I have normal / dry skin that easily breaks out ( peri-menopausal skin) but this product was not enough to make my skin feel comfortable. I have ordered the Hydropeptide Ultra Rich Concenteate ...hopefully that product will give me the moisture without breakout I am looking for
customer_reviews.author: Vadra

customer_reviews.title: Beauty Bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful moisturizer (rich, non-greasy, truly hydrates) recommended by the Aesthetician at a local spa but at half the price that they sell it for. Heckuva deal here.
customer_reviews.author: Librariantomytoes

customer_reviews.title: Good products for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: works as well as the rest of the HydroPeptide line.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not good for my skin. Too irritating. Leaves my skin looking like it has a rash.
customer_reviews.author: LLL

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Not greasy. The smell is very light, but does not linger. Does not make my face feel oily. I have combo skin.
customer_reviews.author: Diboh

customer_reviews.title: Too many irritating ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Why ruin a great product by including irritating citrus extracts and fragrant ingredients? It would be over-priced even if it didn't contain irritating ingredients but with them, it's a no go for this skincare addict. The company clearly did its research on the wonderful impact peptides can have on the skin. Why did they skip the research on the irritating ingredients they included here?
customer_reviews.author: TKPics616

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cream
customer_reviews.text: This has transformed my skin. It's amazing. My skin is so soft and smooth, like a baby's bottom! You have to stick with it, takes time to see results. People want results immediately but that's not realistic. Been using for about a year now and my skin has never been softer, smoother or healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love the cream and the moisturising effect on my skin
customer_reviews.text: Love the cream and the moisturising effect on my skin. One point off for the scent- it's quite citrusy and overbearing
customer_reviews.author: Jodie
